Header: PRECIFAC granted with More legal teeth by sp. Gazette
Content: An extraordinary gazette notification has been issued, giving additional powers to the Special Presidential Commission of Inquiry on Massive Fraud and Corruption (PRECIFAC), to enable it to obtain vital information including bank accounts numbers and other revenue income details which are maintained by the Inland Revenue Department for both the individual being summoned before the Commission and their family members. The particular Gazette was released yesterday on the orders of President Maithripala Sirisena. It has been stated that the additional powers granted followed Â a request made previously by the Commission.
